document_data.name: On the Nature of Shadows
document_data.mainbody: '''''On the Nature of Shadows''''', or in the original [[Talfiric]], '''''K'sai'eb'mal''''', was a book about the [[shadevari]] written by one of the ancient [[Talfir]] people.
document_data.Description: The book was about the history of the shadevari. Its contents contained information about their presence on [[Toril]] before the [[Deity|gods]], the creation of the [[Shadowstar]], and their imprisonment.
document_data.Notable Owners: The book was in the possession of [[Morhion Gen'dahar]] in the {{YearlinkName|1364}}, after the witch [[Isela]] gave it to him while they were in the ancient ruined Talfirian city of [[Talis (city)|Talis]], located in the [[Reaching Woods]].
